parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of included related resources. Allowed list is synonyms, series, themes, themes.entries, themes.entries.videos, themes.song, themes.song.artists & externalResources.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Filter anime by year

parameters.name: season
parameters.description: Filter anime by season. Case-insensitive options are Winter, Spring, Summer & Fall.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort anime resource collection by fields. Case-insensitive options are anime_id, created_at, updated_at, alias, name, year & season.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: The number of resources to return per page. Acceptable range is [1-30]. Default value is 30.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: The page of resources to return.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma-separated list of fields by resource type

get.summary: Get relevant resources by search criteria
get.description: Returns relevant resources by search criteria

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query. Mappings are identical to resource searching.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of each resource to return. Acceptable range is [1-5]. Default value is 5.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: The comma-separated list of resources to include: anime, artists, entries, series, songs, synonyms, themes, videos.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of included related resources. Allowed list is anime, themes & videos.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Filter entries by version.

parameters.name: nsfw
parameters.description: Filter entries by NSFW. Case-insensitive options for true are 1, true, on & yes. Case-insensitive options for false are 0, false, off & no.

parameters.name: spoiler
parameters.description: Filter entries by Spoiler. Case-insensitive options for true are 1, true, on & yes. Case-insensitive options for false are 0, false, off & no.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort entry resource collection by fields. Case-insensitive options are entry_id, created_at, updated_at, version, nsfw, spoiler & theme_id.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: The number of resources to return per page. Acceptable range is [1-30]. Default value is 30.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: The page of resources to return.

parameters.description: The comma-separated list of fields by resource type

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of included related resources. Allowed list is entries, entries.theme & entries.theme.anime.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Filter videos by resolution

parameters.name: nc
parameters.description: Filter videos by NC. Case-insensitive options for true are 1, true, on & yes. Case-insensitive options for false are 0, false, off & no.

parameters.name: subbed
parameters.description: Filter videos by subbed. Case-insensitive options for true are 1, true, on & yes. Case-insensitive options for false are 0, false, off & no.

parameters.name: lyrics
parameters.description: Filter videos by lyrics. Case-insensitive options for true are 1, true, on & yes. Case-insensitive options for false are 0, false, off & no.

parameters.name: uncen
parameters.description: Filter videos by uncen. Case-insensitive options for true are 1, true, on & yes. Case-insensitive options for false are 0, false, off & no.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter videos by source. Case-insensitive options are WEB, RAW, BD, DVD & VHS.

parameters.name: overlap
parameters.description: Filter videos by overlap. Case-insensitive options are NONE, TRANS & OVER.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort video resource collection by fields. Case-insensitive options are video_id, created_at, updated_at, filename, path, basename, resolution, nc, subbed, lyrics, uncen, source & overlap.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: The number of resources to return per page. Acceptable range is [1-30]. Default value is 30.

parameters.description: The page of resources to return.

parameters.description: The comma-separated list of fields by resource type

summer.description: Display a listing of anime of year by season.

name.description: The Primary Title of the Anime

year.description: The Year in which the Anime Premiered

season.description: The Season in which the Anime Premiered

text.description: For alternative titles, licensed titles, common abbreviations and/or shortenings

type.description: Is this an OP or an ED?

group.description: For separating sequences belonging to dubs, rebroadcasts, remasters, etc

name.description: The Primary Name of the Artist

as.description: Used in place of the Artist name if the performance is made as a character or group/unit member

version.description: The Version number of the Theme

episodes.description: The range(s) of episodes that the theme entry is used

nsfw.description: Does the entry include Not Safe For Work content?

spoiler.description: Does the entry include content that spoils the show?

notes.description: Any additional information not included in other fields that may be useful

path.description: The path of the Video in storage

subbed.description: Does the video include subtitles of dialogue?

lyrics.description: Does the video include subtitles for song lyrics?

uncen.description: Is the video an uncensored version of a censored sequence?

source.description: Where did this video come from?

overlap.description: The degree to which the sequence and episode content overlap

link.description: The link to the video stream

external_id.description: The identifier used by the external site
